Title: 1. Top Gun
Description: The Top Gun Naval Fighter Weapons School is where the best of the best train to refine their elite flying skills. When hotshot fighter pilot Maverick is sent to the school, his reckless attitude and cocky demeanor put him at odds with the other pilots, especially the cool and collected Iceman.

Title: 2. Crocodile Dundee
Description: American reporter Sue Charlton travels to the Australian outback to meet eccentric poacher Mick "Crocodile" Dundee and invites him to New York City, where he comes face-to-face with the complexities of modern life. Can this bushman adapt?

Title: 3. Platoon
Description: Chris Taylor, a neophyte recruit in Vietnam, finds himself caught in a battle of wills between two sergeants, one good and the other evil. A shrewd examination of the brutality of war and the duality of man in conflict.

Title: 4. The Karate Kid Part II
Description: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

Title: 5. Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
Description: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

Title: 6. Back to School
Description: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

Title: 7. Aliens
Description: Decades after surviving the Nostromo incident, Ellen Ripley is sent out to re-establish contact with a terraforming colony but finds herself battling the Alien Queen and her offspring.

Title: 8. The Golden Child
Description: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child whom dark forces want to eliminate.

Title: 9. Ruthless People
Description: A couple cheated by a vile businessman kidnaps his wife in retaliation, not knowing that their enemy is delighted that they did.

Title: 10. Ferris Bueller's Day Off
Description: A brash, cocky high school senior, tired of skipping school to spend a boring day at home, is determined to enjoy an epic day roaring around his favorite Chicago sites, enlisting his best friend and girlfriend to join him on the adventure.

Title: 11. Down and Out in Beverly Hills
Description: A rich but troubled family find their lives altered by the arrival of a vagrant who tries to drown himself in their swimming pool.

Title: 12. The Color of Money
Description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

Title: 13. Stand by Me
Description: A writer recounts a childhood journey with his friends to find the body of a missing boy.

Title: 14. Legal Eagles
Description: A New York district attorney works and flirts with his adversary and her kooky artist client, who is on trial for a murder she didn't commit.

Title: 15. Cobra
Description: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far-reaching plans.

Title: 16. An American Tail
Description: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must locate them while trying to survive in a new country.

Title: 17. Police Academy 3: Back in Training
Description: After it's announced that one of the two police academies in the state will be closed down, the alumni of Commandant Lassard's Police Academy (1984) return to the school to train new recruits and compete against the other academy.

Title: 18. Heartbreak Ridge
Description: Hard-nosed, hard-living Marine Gunnery Sergeant Tom Highway clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.

Title: 19. Peggy Sue Got Married
Description: Peggy Sue, on the verge of a divorce, faints at her 25th high school reunion, and wakes up to find herself back in 1960, leading her to try to spot and correct the mistakes that led to disappointments and an unhappy marriage.

Title: 20. Poltergeist II: The Other Side
Description: The Freeling family have a new house, but their troubles with supernatural forces don't seem to be over.

Title: 21. Short Circuit
Description: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

Title: 22. Pretty in Pink
Description: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

Title: 23. The Fly
Description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

Title: 24. Hannah and Her Sisters
Description: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

Title: 25. Three Amigos!
Description: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

Title: 26. Little Shop of Horrors
Description: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

Title: 27. About Last Night
Description: Chicago singles meet in a bar, live together and call it love. Based on David Mamet's play Sexual Perversity in Chicago.

Title: 28. The Great Mouse Detective
Description: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

Title: 29. Running Scared
Description: Two street-wise Chicago cops have to shake off some rust after returning from a Key West vacation to pursue a drug dealer who nearly killed them in the past.

Title: 30. The Money Pit
Description: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

Title: 31. Gung Ho
Description: When a Japanese automobile company buys an American plant, the American liaison must mediate the clash of work attitudes between the foreign management and native labor.

Title: 32. Nothing in Common
Description: A successful advertising executive finds his freewheeling life crashing to a halt when his parents end their longtime marriage.

Title: 33. Children of a Lesser God
Description: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

Title: 34. Jumpin' Jack Flash
Description: An American computer whiz who works at a New York bank is suddenly thrust into the world of international espionage after she inadvertently receives a coded message from a British spy.

Title: 35. Hoosiers
Description: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small-town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the state championship in 1950s Indiana.

Title: 36. Soul Man
Description: To achieve his dream of attending Harvard, a pampered teen poses as a young black man to receive a full scholarship.

Title: 37. Wildcats
Description: Rookie high school football coach Molly McGrath has a harder time than she expected trying to whip her tough inner-city team members into shape.

Title: 38. Heartburn
Description: She's a magazine writer who gives up her career for love and family. He's a playboy newspaper columnist who can't quite give up his old tricks. And if that combination doesn't give a relationship Heartburn, nothing will.

Title: 39. The Morning After
Description: A washed-up, alcoholic actress who is prone to blackouts wakes up next to a murdered man. Did she kill him and, if not, is she in danger?

Title: 40. Iron Eagle
Description: A young pilot plans a rescue mission when his father, an Air Force Colonel, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.

Title: 41. Crimes of the Heart
Description: Three southern sisters try to come to grips with the meaning of their mother's suicide.

Title: 42. Tough Guys
Description: Two elderly gangsters are released from prison only to find they have trouble fitting in as old men who still take no guff from anyone.

Title: 43. F/X
Description: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

Title: 44. Friday the 13th Part VI: Jason Lives
Description: Tommy Jarvis exhumes Jason Voorhees to cremate his corpse, but inadvertently brings him back to life instead. The newly revived killer seeks revenge, and Tommy may be the only one who can stop him.

Title: 45. Flight of the Navigator
Description: In 1978, a boy travels eight years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

Title: 46. Jo Jo Dancer, Your Life Is Calling
Description: After severely burning himself in a drug incident, a comedian has a near death experience in which he reviews his life.

Title: 47. The Delta Force
Description: After a plane is hijacked by terrorists, The Delta Force is sent in to resolve the crisis.

Title: 48. The Big Easy
Description: A corrupt lieutenant in the homicide division is threatened by the righteous DA while trying to solve a string of mysterious murders.

Title: 49. The Mission
Description: Eighteenth-century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

Title: 50. Howard the Duck
Description: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop an alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a struggling female rock singer.

Title: 51. Raw Deal
Description: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

Title: 52. Armed and Dangerous
Description: A fired cop and useless lawyer sign up as security guards and find they've joined a corrupt union.

Title: 53. Youngblood
Description: A 17 year old farm boy is offered an ice hockey tryout. His brother drives him to Canada. He has fast legs, slow fists, but is chosen. Will he learn to use his fists and play ice hockey the Canuck way? Will he get the coach's cute daughter?

Title: 54. Psycho III
Description: Norman Bates falls in love with a fallen nun who stays at the Bates Motel alongside a drifter and a curious reporter. Meanwhile, "Mother" is still watching.

Title: 55. The Mosquito Coast
Description: An inventor spurns his city life and moves his family into the jungles of Central America to make a utopia.

Title: 56. Sweet Liberty
Description: After selling the rights of his book to a movie production company, a writer finds himself fighting the many egos and varying views around him.

Title: 57. Labyrinth
Description: Teenage Sarah journeys through a maze to save her baby brother from the Goblin King.

Title: 58. One Crazy Summer
Description: An aspiring teenage cartoonist and his friends come to the aid of a singer trying to save her family property from developers.

Title: 59. Extremities
Description: A woman narrowly escapes assault but loses her purse. Fearing retaliation, she seeks help. When her attacker returns, she manages to trap him. Now she faces a moral quandary: free him, report him, or take matters into her own hands.

Title: 60. The Adventures of Milo and Otis
Description: The adventures of a young cat and a dog as they find themselves accidentally separated and each swept into a hazardous trek.

Title: 61. Critters
Description: A group of small but vicious alien creatures called Crites escape from an alien prison transport vessel and land near a small farm town on earth, pursued by two shape-shifting bounty hunters.

Title: 62. April Fool's Day
Description: Nine college students staying at a friend's remote island mansion begin to fall victim to an unseen murderer over the April Fool's Day weekend, but nothing is as it seems.

Title: 63. Club Paradise
Description: A retired Chicago firefighter partners with a reggae singer to turn a seedy Caribbean nightclub into a resort for affluent tourists.

Title: 64. No Mercy
Description: A Chicago detective, seeking to avenge his partner's death, travels to New Orleans where he unexpectedly becomes involved in a cat and mouse game of survival.

Title: 65. Brighton Beach Memoirs
Description: Eugene, a young teenage Jewish boy, recalls his memoirs of his time as an adolescent youth. He goes through the hardships of puberty, sexual fantasy, and living the life of a poor boy in a crowded house.

Title: 66. Firewalker
Description: A pair of adventurers try to track down an ancient Aztec/Mayan/Egyptian/Apache hoard of gold.

Title: 67. Big Trouble in Little China
Description: A rough-and-tumble trucker and his sidekick face off with an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

Title: 68. Under the Cherry Moon
Description: Two con artist brothers attempt to swindle a soon-to-be wealthy heiress, but things get complicated when one falls in love with her.

Title: 69. Murphy's Law
Description: Framed for his ex-wife's murder by a parolee he once put behind bars, Los Angeles cop Jack Murphy escapes from custody to capture the killer, but he is now handcuffed to a foul-mouthed thief he had only just arrested.

Title: 70. SpaceCamp
Description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

Title: 71. Deadly Friend
Description: After his friend is killed by her abusive father, the new kid in town attempts to save her by implanting a robotic microchip into her brain.

Title: 72. Manhunter
Description: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial killer dubbed "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

Title: 73. Blue Velvet
Description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

Title: 74. Care Bears Movie II: A New Generation
Description: The Care Bears try to help a young girl at summer camp who, in an effort to revamp her dorky social status to agility and skill, enters into a sinister bargain with a shape-shifting demon posing as a young boy.

Title: 75. Wise Guys
Description: Harry Valentini and Moe Dickstein are both errand boys for the Mob. When they lose two hundred fifty thousand dollars, they are set up to kill each other. But they run off to Atlantic City, and comedy follows.

Title: 76. Something Wild
Description: A free-spirited woman "kidnaps" a yuppie for a weekend of adventure. But the fun quickly takes a dangerous turn when her ex-convict husband shows up.

Title: 77. Lucas
Description: A socially inept fourteen-year-old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends - Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love - fall for each other.

Title: 78. Haunted Honeymoon
Description: Two radio voice actors are getting married. Larry has fits of fear. A shrink needs 36 hours to scare him to death and cure him - during a family reunion at a scary family castle.

Title: 79. The Texas Chainsaw Massacre 2
Description: A radio host is victimized by the cannibal family as a former Texas marshal hunts them.

Title: 80. The Best of Times
Description: A small-town loser determines to have one more shot at the big time by winning a football game.

Title: 81. Quicksilver
Description: Failed stock market whiz kid Jack Casey gets a job on a bike at San Francisco's Quicksilver Speed Delivery, where he befriends entrepreneur Hector Rodriguez and attractive fellow bicycler Terri, then finds an enemy in drug dealer Gypsy.

Title: 82. Wanted: Dead or Alive
Description: A bounty hunter is offered $250,000 by CIA to get the terrorist behind an LA movie theater bombing. He quit CIA because he couldn't trust them. Can they be trusted now? Can he stop the terrorists?

Title: 83. Maximum Overdrive
Description: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

Title: 84. Witchboard
Description: When his girlfriend becomes dangerously obsessed with a ghost she contacted using a Ouija board, Jim reluctantly joins forces with her ex-his own estranged childhood best friend-to identify and exorcise the evil spirit.

Title: 85. The Boy Who Could Fly
Description: An autistic boy who dreams of flying touches everyone he meets, including a new family who has moved in after their father dies.

Title: 86. The Name of the Rose
Description: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

Title: 87. She's Gotta Have It
Description: Story of a woman and her three lovers.

Title: 88. Blue City
Description: A drifter returns to his Florida hometown only to discover that his father, the local mayor, was mysteriously murdered during his absence. Vowing to find the killer and avenge his father's death, he starts his own investigation.

Title: 89. Trick or Treat
Description: A bullied teenage boy is devastated after the death of his heavy metal idol, Sammi Curr. But as Halloween night approaches, he discovers that he may be the only one who can stop Sammi from making a Satanic comeback from beyond the grave.

Title: 90. 9½ Weeks
Description: A New York art gallery curator starts a torrid love affair with a suave stranger who keeps pushing her boundaries.

Title: 91. Black Moon Rising
Description: A thief named Quint is hired by the Justice Department to steal incriminating tapes from a corrupt corporation. The tapes vanish when Quint hides them in the back of a hydrodynamic powered racing car that is stolen by a hot car ring.

Title: 92. Just Between Friends
Description: Holly and Sandy strike up an instant friendship, not knowing that they actually have more in common than they'd like. Their relationship is tested when tragedy strikes.

Title: 93. A Fine Mess
Description: An actor and a chef fathom a plot to fix a horse race and attempt at capitalizing it, while striving to tackle two of the hitmen responsible for the scheme.

Title: 94. My Little Pony: The Movie
Description: Ponyland comes under attack from the Smooze, a massive purple ooze created by an evil witch who plans to destroy the ponies' annual spring festival.

Title: 95. Highlander
Description: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponents, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

Title: 96. The Transformers: The Movie
Description: The Autobots must stop a colossal planet-consuming robot who goes after the Autobot Matrix of Leadership. At the same time, they must defend themselves against an all-out attack from the Decepticons.

Title: 97. The Hitcher
Description: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitchhiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

Title: 98. Crossroads
Description: A wannabe blues-guitar virtuoso finds an old blues player and hopes he can teach him a long-lost song by legendary musician, Robert Johnson.

Title: 99. Mona Lisa
Description: A man recently released from prison manages to get a job driving a call girl from customer to customer.

Title: 100. Wisdom
Description: Unable to find work after a past felony, graduate John Wisdom and his girlfriend embark on a cross-country bank-robbing spree in order to aid American farmers.
